title: Dani Dyer grilled over Jack Fincham split as she talks 'happy' romance with Sammy Kimmence
text:

Dani Dyer opened up on her romance with boyfriend and "best friend" Sammy Kimmence on Loose Women on Monday.

The Love Island 2018 star's split from her ex Jack Fincham , who she met on the show, was confirmed in April and she began dating Sammy in May.

Five months on and the pair are living together, with Dani saying their relationship "just works".

But the Loose Women panel couldn't help bring up her ex Jack months on from their split, and over a year since their stint on the ITV2 dating series.

(Image: ITV)

As Dani reminisced about her Love Island journey, Jane Moore said: "I have to ask because this is the first time you've been on with us.

"We believed in you and Jack. We loved it... what went wrong when you came out?"

Dani laughed off the comment, before revealing they were in "a bubble" during the show with things not working when they left the villa.

She said: "I just think it doesn't work sometimes. It's like any relationship, sometimes it does sometimes it doesn't."

Asked if there was pressure on them to work once they won the show, she added: "Yeah.

"I think when you're on Love Island you're in a bubble, it's summer, it's like a holiday romance."

(Image: danidyerxx/Instagram)

On her romance with new partner Sammy, she cleared up claims they were dating before Love Island while admitting he was her "best friend".

She explained: "I knew him before but there was this massive thing that we were together and stuff and it was an old fling.

"No he wasn't, I knew of him through friends, then we got together and it has just been really nice."

(Image: ITV)

On living together, she added: "It sounds so weird but it just works, he's like my best friend.

"It was just nice, when you're with someone and you're just happy, and they're the first person you wanna call."

She even joked Sammy was more scared of her mum than her famous dad Danny Dyer, as the panel confessed they'd be worried about meeting him.

The father and daughter will team up again in Nativity The Musical this year, while they also both feature in the new series of MTV's True Love or True Lies, with Dani making her presenting debut.

Loose Women airs weekdays at 12:30pm on ITV.
description: Former Love Island star Dani Dyer is living with her partner Sammy Kimmence, and says their romance just 'works'
